languages.text: {n}Вы слышите шепот за спиной. Горячий, полный страсти шепот Кибеллы — она молится Неумирающему, закрыв глаза и счастливо улыбаясь и стискивая оружие до белых костяшек. Широко распахнув глаза, она тихо произносит:{/n} "Как я рада этой новой встрече, Вил'Тервантьяс".

{n}You hear a whisper behind you — Kibellah's ardent, ecstatic whisper. She is praying to the Undying One, her eyes closed, a blissful smile on her lips, clutching her weapons in a white-knuckled grip. Then she opens her eyes wide and says quietly,{/n} "I cannot tell you how glad I am to meet you again, Vil'Tervantias."
languages.original_text: {n}Вы слышите шепот за спиной. Горячий, полный страсти шепот Кибеллы — она молится Неумирающему, закрыв глаза и счастливо улыбаясь и стискивая оружие до белых костяшек. Широко распахнув глаза, она тихо произносит:{/n} "Как я рада этой новой встрече, Вил'Тервантьяс".

languages.text: {n}Oyes un susurro a tu lado: el ferviente y pletórico susurro de Kibellah. Le está rezando al Inmortal con los ojos cerrados y una sonrisa feliz en la boca. Sus manos palidecen por la fuerza con la que sujeta sus armas. De pronto, abre los ojos de par en par y, con voz queda, proclama:{/n} «No sabes cuánto me alegro de volver a verte, Vil'Tervantias».
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a whisper behind you — Kibellah's ardent, ecstatic whisper. She is praying to the Undying One, her eyes closed, a blissful smile on her lips, clutching her weapons in a white-knuckled grip. Then she opens her eyes wide and says quietly,{/n} "I cannot tell you how glad I am to meet you again, Vil'Tervantias."

traits.locale_text: {n}Oyes un susurro a tu lado: el ferviente y pletórico susurro de Kibellah. Le está rezando al Inmortal con los ojos cerrados y una sonrisa feliz en la boca. Sus manos palidecen por la fuerza con la que sujeta sus armas. De pronto, abre los ojos de par en par y, con voz queda, proclama:{/n} «No sabes cuánto me alegro de volver a verte, Vil'Tervantias».

languages.text: {n}あなたの背後からささやきが聞こえてきた。キベラの熱烈な、恍惚としたささやきだ。彼女は目を閉じ、唇に至福の笑みを浮かべ、武器を握り締めながら、不死の者に祈りを捧げている。そして彼女は目を大きく開き、静かに言った。 {/n} 「ヴィルテルヴァンティアス、あなたに再会いできてどれほど嬉しいことか」
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a whisper behind you — Kibellah's ardent, ecstatic whisper. She is praying to the Undying One, her eyes closed, a blissful smile on her lips, clutching her weapons in a white-knuckled grip. Then she opens her eyes wide and says quietly,{/n} "I cannot tell you how glad I am to meet you again, Vil'Tervantias."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの背後からささやきが聞こえてきた。キベラの熱烈な、恍惚としたささやきだ。彼女は目を閉じ、唇に至福の笑みを浮かべ、武器を握り締めながら、不死の者に祈りを捧げている。そして彼女は目を大きく開き、静かに言った。 {/n} 「ヴィルテルヴァンティアス、あなたに再会いできてどれほど嬉しいことか」

languages.text: {n}你听到身后传来了低语声，那是绮贝菈炽热而狂喜的低语。她闭上双眼，向不死之神祈祷，嘴角挂着至福的微笑，双手握紧了武器。随后，她瞪大了眼睛，平静地开了口。{/n}“我们又见面了，敌者特万提亚斯。我无法用语言表达我心中的喜悦。”
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a whisper behind you — Kibellah's ardent, ecstatic whisper. She is praying to the Undying One, her eyes closed, a blissful smile on her lips, clutching her weapons in a white-knuckled grip. Then she opens her eyes wide and says quietly,{/n} "I cannot tell you how glad I am to meet you again, Vil'Tervantias."

traits.locale_text: {n}你听到身后传来了低语声，那是绮贝菈炽热而狂喜的低语。她闭上双眼，向不死之神祈祷，嘴角挂着至福的微笑，双手握紧了武器。随后，她瞪大了眼睛，平静地开了口。{/n}“我们又见面了，敌者特万提亚斯。我无法用语言表达我心中的喜悦。”

languages.text: {n}Du hörst hinter dir ein Flüstern – es ist Kibellah, hektisch und ekstatisch. Sie betet zum Todlosen, mit geschlossenen Augen, einem seligen Lächeln auf den Lippen, ihre Waffen mit weißen Knöcheln umklammert. Dann öffnet sie ihre Augen weit und sagt leise:{/n} "Ich kann Euch nicht sagen, wie froh ich bin, Euch wiederzutreffen, Vil'Tervantias."
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a whisper behind you — Kibellah's ardent, ecstatic whisper. She is praying to the Undying One, her eyes closed, a blissful smile on her lips, clutching her weapons in a white-knuckled grip. Then she opens her eyes wide and says quietly,{/n} "I cannot tell you how glad I am to meet you again, Vil'Tervantias."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hörst hinter dir ein Flüstern – es ist Kibellah, hektisch und ekstatisch. Sie betet zum Todlosen, mit geschlossenen Augen, einem seligen Lächeln auf den Lippen, ihre Waffen mit weißen Knöcheln umklammert. Dann öffnet sie ihre Augen weit und sagt leise:{/n} "Ich kann Euch nicht sagen, wie froh ich bin, Euch wiederzutreffen, Vil'Tervantias."

languages.text: {n}Vous entendez un murmure derrière vous... Les psalmodies ferventes et extatiques de Kibellah. Les yeux clos, un sourire béat aux lèvres, elle prie l'Immortel en enserrant ses armes dans une poigne de fer. Puis, elle ouvre grand les yeux et prend la parole calmement :{/n} « Vous n'imaginez pas à quel point je suis heureuse de vous revoir, Vil'Tervantias. »
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a whisper behind you — Kibellah's ardent, ecstatic whisper. She is praying to the Undying One, her eyes closed, a blissful smile on her lips, clutching her weapons in a white-knuckled grip. Then she opens her eyes wide and says quietly,{/n} "I cannot tell you how glad I am to meet you again, Vil'Tervantias."

languages.text: {n}Arkandan gelen bir fısıltı duyuyorsun. Kibellah'nın coşkulu ve keyif dolu fısıltısı bu. Gözleri sımsıkı kapanmış hâlde Ölmeyen'e dua ediyor. Dudaklarındaki mutlu gülümseme eşliğinde heyecanla silahlarını kavrıyor. Ardından gözlerini fal taşı gibi açarak sakince konuşuyor.{/n} "Seninle bir kez daha yolumuz kesiştiği için ne kadar memnun olduğumu anlatamam Vil'Tervantias."
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a whisper behind you — Kibellah's ardent, ecstatic whisper. She is praying to the Undying One, her eyes closed, a blissful smile on her lips, clutching her weapons in a white-knuckled grip. Then she opens her eyes wide and says quietly,{/n} "I cannot tell you how glad I am to meet you again, Vil'Tervantias."
